description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Ice Blocks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruit Ice Blocks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel mango and chop flesh into small pieces. Chop strawberries and cut watermelon and rockmelon into small pieces.
Drop pieces of fruit into each iceblock mould. Small pieces of fruit work better as youâ€™ll be able to fit more into each mould.
Fill each mould with juice. Gently tap the filled moulds on the bench top to settle fruit and clear air bubbles. You can also use a skewer to do this.
Fit the handles into the top of the moulds and place in freezer. Freeze iceblocks for about 2 hours until solid.
To unmould, hold the tray under cold running water for 1 minute or until the iceblocks loosen.
